name: Find index
description: Search through an Array of items and apply a formula to each item, to return the index of the first item where the formula returns True.

arguments.name: Formula
arguments.description: The predicate formula that each item in the Array is passed to.

output.description: The index of the first item in the Array where the predicate formula returns True. Returns -1 if the predicate formula did not return True for any item.
